Package com.simon.simontree.api

Interface ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModificationBinaryTreeOperations
public interface ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface
Defines operations for working with a binary tree structure containing modifications and modification groups. Provides methods for tree traversal, searching, and cost calculations. Full documentation can be found in the implementationModificationBinaryTreeOperations.

  • Method Details

    • findModificationOnGivenLevelById

      Modification findModificationOnGivenLevelById(int id, int level)
      Finds a modification by ID at given tree level. Uses ModificationBinaryTree findModificationOnGivenLevelById method, which throws NoSuchElementException if no modification exists with the given ID at the specified level, it is handled via a try-catch block, in the method. IllegalArgumentException
      Parameters:
      id - the modification ID to search for
      level - the tree level to search in (0-based)
      Returns:
      the found Modification
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if level is invalid
      NoSuchElementException - if id is invalid

    • getModificationGroupsUpToLevel

      Set<ModificationGroup> getModificationGroupsUpToLevel(int level)
      Returns the total number of ModificationGroup in the tree up to the given level (level you have selected and the levels below)
      Parameters:
      level - the tree level to search in (0-based)
      Returns:
      immutable Set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if level is invalid

    • getModificationGroupsAtLevel

      Set<ModificationGroup> getModificationGroupsAtLevel(int level)
      Returns the total number of ModificationGroup in the tree on a given level
      Parameters:
      level - the tree level to search in (0-based)
      Returns:
      immutable Set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if level is invalid

    • getModificationGroupLevel

      int getModificationGroupLevel(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Returns the total number of ModificationGroup in the tree on a given level
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - a ModificationGroup object you wish to know the level of
      Returns:
      int value of the level (0-based)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if level is invalid

    • calculateModificationGroupCostOnGivenLevel

      Long calculateModificationGroupCostOnGivenLevel(ModificationGroup modificationGroup, int level)
      Calculates the total cost of all modifications under a given group (including its level and all below)
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - the group to calculate the cost for
      Returns:
      the total calculated cost

    • findBiggestPriorityValueModificationOnAGivenLevel

      Modification findBiggestPriorityValueModificationOnAGivenLevel(int level)
      Finds the modification with the highest priority value on a given level
      Parameters:
      level - the level to search in
      Returns:
      the modification with the highest priority, or null if none found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if level is invalid
